1.summary: The overall precision of P-Adapters is still modest.
1.verbatim: Overall precision is still modest, with the best models only correctly predicting 50% of facts

2.summary: The analysis of embeddings focuses narrowly on subject/object, potentially missing other important aspects.
2.verbatim: Analysis of what embeddings to keep focuses on subject/object, overlooking other aspects of the prompt that could be important

3.summary: There is no human evaluation of the interpretability of the continuous prompts.
3.verbatim: No human evaluation of the interpretability of the continuous prompts

4.summary: Complex tasks beyond factual extraction are not explored in the paper.
4.verbatim: More complex tasks beyond factual extraction are not explored
